name: Positive & Negative
description:
Positive & Negative is a simple and engaging Puzzle Game, where you need to use your brain and travel between the 2 dimensions in order to complete 10 levels.
Collect keys, press buttons, move obstacles and transform the white walls in front of you in a clear path by inverting colors!

This is my first Game with Unity, i was gonna initially release this game on Android with Play Store, but being my first time i'm still trying to figure out how to do it and stuff, so i thought this would be a good starting point to get feedbacks.

I consider this little game the start of my journey as Game Developer and Game Designer, in the future I'll try to make more games with more complex stuff.

This game is totally free, and also be free to give me any tip or report any bugs.

Thanks to all, I really hope you enjoy this little game!

HOW TO PLAY:

- Click and Drag in any direction (Up, Left, Down, Right) to move the Square

- Click the "Invert" button to reveal the opposite dimension of the level

- Click the "Reset" button to start over
